reviews.text: I need to update my review. I gave a one because I believed this item was missing from my order, but I had mistaken the package as batteries that came with another one of my orders. My mistake! They are very nice looking, but I'm in the middle of a remodel so I will not be connecting them for a while so I do not know how well they work yet, but they do look very nice.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2025
reviews.title: My Mistake

reviews.text: I have a house full of boys on most days and they are somehow always covered in grease and dirt. I was concerned that with this style of light switch it would show streaks on the wider space. It doesnâ€™t!! It is a beautiful gold color. These were easy to install and great quality for the money! I love the plug cover on the inside as these are in my bathroom. I donâ€™t fear moisture sneaking in! Love these outlets.

reviews.text: The brushed gold finish looks nice but the lightswitch is very cheaply made. Lasted approximately 4 months until one day I flipped my bathroom switch on and it fell off.
